original_content:
This week and next we take off for the holidays! We have an exciting schedule after the break, so stay tuned!


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:


	<!--  Google Podcasts  -->
	<!-- iTunes  -->
	Spotify
	<!--  Stitcher  -->
	RSS
		<!-- YouTube  -->


Theme music: Newer Wave Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

title: - 次回の放送もお楽しみに！ホリデー後の予定発表
body: 今週と来週は休暇です。特別なスケジュールがあるのでお楽しみに！
titles: - 次回の放送もお楽しみに！ホリデー後の予定発表
- YouTubeでのライブ録画をお見逃しなく！
